name: Nanuuu
greetingText: You know how much I really missing you!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Nanuu...!! Sending my love and wishes to you
text2: My wishes, my love, my tears and entire me always be with you forever Nanuuu!!
text3: As I'm not infront of you to wish you while kissing you on your fore head.
text4: I'm sending my Virtual wishes and kisses to you through this
outroText: Okay, Once again I hope you shine like a moon as always
